com.xatkit.plugins.react.platform

Class ReactPlatform

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.xatkit.core.platform.RuntimePlatform
      • com.xatkit.plugins.chat.platform.ChatPlatform
        • com.xatkit.plugins.react.platform.ReactPlatform

  • public class ReactPlatform
extends ChatPlatform
    A ChatPlatform class that interacts with the Xatkit React component.

    This ChatPlatform manages a list of pending messages that can be queried by the xatkit-react application to display them. It initializes a REST endpoint and registers it to the Xatkit server, allowing to reply to xatkit-react REST queries.

    This platform provides the following actions:

    • Reply: replies to a user input
    • PostMessage: post a message to a given channel (i.e. window running a xatkit-react instance)

    This platform registers a webhook at /react/getAnswer, that provides the last answer associated to a given channel.

    This class is part of xatkit's core paltform, and can be used in an execution model by importing the ReactPlatform package.

    • Constructor Detail

      • ReactPlatform

        public ReactPlatform(XatkitCore xatkitCore,
                     Configuration configuration)
        Constructs a new ReactPlatform from the provided XatkitCore and Configuration.

        This constructor initializes the underlying REST endpoint at /react/getAnswers, allowing to retrieve the stored answers associated to a channel. The stored message are returned as a json object with the following structure: 

         
 {
  messages: [
      {value: 'Message 1'},
      {value: 'Message 2"}
  ]
 }
        Note that client applications can iterate the messages array to display the messages in the same order they have been produced.

        A REST request on /rest/getAnswers must contain a JSON object with a channel field containing the channel to retrieve the answer for.

        Parameters:
        xatkitCore - the XatkitCore instance associated to this runtimePlatform
        configuration - the platform's Configuration
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - if the provided xatkitCore or configuration is null

    • Method Detail

      • storeMessage

        public void storeMessage(String channel,
                         String message)
        Stores the provided message for the given channel.

        The stored message can be accessed by xatkit-react through the /react/getAnswers endpoint.

        Parameters:
        channel - the channel associated to the message to store
        message - the message to store

      • getMessagesFor

        public Queue<String> getMessagesFor(String channel)
        Returns the messages stored for the provided channel.

        This method returns a Queue containing the stored messages. Note that calling Queue.poll() on the returned object will remove the message.

        Parameters:
        channel - the channel to retrieve the messages for
        Returns:
        a Queue containing the messages stored for the provided channel

      • createSessionFromChannel

        public XatkitSession createSessionFromChannel(String channel)
        Creates a XatkitSession from the provided channel.

        This method ensures that the same XatkitSession is returned for the same channel.

        Parameters:
        channel - the channel to create a XatkitSession from
        Returns:
        the created XatkitSession
